original_title: Ceylon Jewelry Manufacturers clinch Gold again at annual NCE awards
original_body_lines: Members of the CJM team with the award: From Left: Senior Lead Production Kanchana, Senior Executive Finance Baghya, Senior Executive HR Lakshini, Senior Lead CAD Ishan, Director Sales and Marketing Suhayl, Senior Lead QC Priyantha and Senior Lead Setting Madushan

One of the largest jewellery manufacturers and exporters in Sri Lanka, Ceylon Jewelry Manufacturers Ltd. (CJM) yet again won the Gold award at the prestigious annual event hosted by the National Chamber of Exporters of Sri Lanka at the Shangri-La Hotel, Colombo on 8 December 2023.

CJM has been a regular awardee with multiple accolades under its belt over the decades. The company has been recognised this time with a Gold award under the large category of Gem studded jewellery sector.

CJM is one of the few factories in Sri Lanka certified by the Responsible Jewelry Council (RJC) of the United States of America and is in business for almost three decades. A member of the management of CJM opined that the company sees a promising future despite global and local challenges and geared to live up its potential and continue to influence the lifestyle of the people through its unique designs and quality products B to B and B to C channels.
